Introduction
FileSystem_DeviceAbstraction_RTOS_FATFS005 App

Introduction

FileSystem_DeviceAbstraction_FATFS005 App as the name suggests abstracts all the block devices underlying it. It is a thin generic upper layer which interfaces with all other block devices' block interfaces in RTOS environment. The disk I/O module is not a part of FatFs module so this layer is implemented.

Scope

FileSystem_DeviceAbstraction_FATFS005 App can use one or both of the block devices like SDMMC Block Layer App and USB Block Layer App as shown below. SDMMC Block Device will be always present and fixed at drive# 0 . USB device if present will be at drive# 1 .

FATFS005_abbreviation

  1. SDMMC: Secure Digital/ Multimedia Card
  2. API: Application Program Interface
  3. GUI: Graphical User Interface
  4. IOCTL : Input/Output Control
  5. DMA: Direct Memory Access
  6. RTOS: Real Time Operating System
  7. LLD: Low Level Driver
  8. CSD: Card Specific Data
  9. CID: Card identification number
  10. OCR: Operation conditions register
  11. SCR: SD Configuration Register
  12. CSR: Card Status Register
  13. RCA: Relative card address
  14. DAL: Device Abstraction Layer

FATFS005_reference

  1. http://elm-chan.org/fsw/ff/00index_e.html

FATFS005_limitation

None
